| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | negidd.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |

| 3 |  | subaddd.3 | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |

| 5 |  | #P_addsubeq4 | |- ( ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) /\ ( C e. CC /\ D e. CC ) ) -> ( ( A + B ) = ( C + D ) <-> ( C - A ) = ( B - D ) ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_syl22anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) = ( C + D ) <-> ( C - A ) = ( B - D ) ) ) |
